name: Rad Lad's Hoop Dreams: Power Edition
name_original: Rad Lad's Hoop Dreams: Power Edition
description:
Follow Rad Lad in his quest to recover his Capri Sun stash, stolen by the evil Fruitzers.

Spin the hoop using WASD until it gathers enough POG energy to destroy the Fruitzers.

Who Likes to Party Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
